nodes.bodyText: This will break possible deserialized configuration using lower-cased versions of these values

Also, logic in line 87 of this same file will stop working too.
Please be very careful when changing enum fields. I'm more than happy to see enum field names with correct letter case, but right now we have a problem with how stuff gets deserialized from Maven configurations with plexus.

This constant seems related to 
  
    
      jkube/jkube-kit/build/api/src/main/java/org/eclipse/jkube/kit/build/api/assembly/JKubeBuildTarArchiver.java
    
    
         Line 55
      in
      300fcfd
    
    
    
    

        
          
           File outputFile = new File(buildDirs.getTemporaryRootDirectory(), "docker-build." + (compression.equals(ArchiveCompression.none) ? "tar" : compression.getFileSuffix())); 
        
    
  

.
Maybe we should share at least the filename in some constant common to both classes (Preferably in the Archiver)

Does it make sense to add some log.info here to notify the user?
I think we are doing this in the Mojo, but it's probably better to move that here (think of future Gradle plugin)

Anyway, this enum constant is still used (nested) in Model configurations that can be deserialized (ImageConfiguration>WatchImageConfiugration). I strongly recommend to keep them lower case until we figure out a way to deserialize these value using some sort of case insensitive method (probably using a manual setter and constructor).
This parameter belongs now to BuildMojo (jib build strategy is applicable both for OpenShift and Kubernetes)
Ok, just saw it's in AbstractDockerMojo, please remove from here.

nit: The name of this file's parent directory makes me think that it was persisted by accident.
Something like 'static/testFile.txt` sounds more suitable/standard.

This file contains bidirectional Unicode text that may be interpreted or compiled differently than what appears below. To review, open the file in an editor that reveals hidden Unicode characters. Learn more about bidirectional Unicode characters


  


    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                <name>Eclipse JKube Maven :: Sample :: Spring Boot Web with JIB</name>
          
          
            
                <name>Eclipse JKube :: Quickstarts :: Maven :: Spring Boot JIB</name>
